reKyc.allAccountsMappedGetsUpdated: All accounts mapped to the customer ID will be updated.

modal.checkBoxText: By clicking the check box, I hereby agree to proceed with the biometric authentication.
modal.noChangeInKYCDetailsPopUpMessage: The Customer has verified the existing KYC information present in the bank records and confirmed that there is no change in KYC information. Further, the customer hereby, has agreed to indemnify and keep the Bank indemnified at all times from and against any and all losses, expenses, damages, claims and/or costs that may be incurred by the Bank with regard to acceptance of this declaration. In case any of the above information is found to be false or untrue or misleading or misrepresenting, the customer has been made aware that he/she/they may be held liable for it. In the event of further change in KYC information, the customer has agreed to intimate the bank about the same. Also, the customer has been made aware that he/she/they accept the above declaration by agreeing to verify his/her/their identity using Aadhaar biometric authentication for the purpose of Re-KYC.
modal.updateCommunicationAddressPopUpMessage: The Customer has verified the existing KYC information present in the bank records and intends to update communication address only, confirming that there is no change in remaining KYC information. Further, the customer hereby, has agreed to indemnify and keep the Bank indemnified at all times from and against any and all losses, expenses, damages, claims and/or costs that may be incurred by the Bank with regard to acceptance of this declaration. In case any of the above information is found to be false or untrue or misleading or misrepresenting, the customer has been made aware that he/she/they may be held liable for it. In the event of further change in KYC information, the customer has agreed to intimate the bank about the same. Also, the customer has been made aware that he/she/they accept the above declaration by agreeing to verify his/her/their identity using Aadhaar biometric authentication for the purpose of Re-KYC and communication address update.
modal.proceedWithAadhaarBiometricPopUpMessage: Customer states that, I/We hereby state that I/we have no objection in authenticating myself/ourselves with Aadhaar based authentication system and consent to providing my/our Aadhaar Number and(One Time Pin) OTP data (and/or any similar authentication mechanism) to Bandhan Bank for Aadhaar based authentication for the purposes of availing banking service from Bandhan Bank.
modal.proceedWithAadhaarBiometricPopUpMessage2: I/We understand that my/our information submitted to  Bandhan Bank herewith shall not be used for any purpose other than mentioned hereinabove. I/We hereby declare that all the above information voluntarily furnished by me/us is true, correct and complete. I/We understand and agree that Bandhan Bank may disclose information about my/our account(s), with or without notice/intimation, if required or permitted by law, rule or regulations, or at the request of any public or regulatory authority or if such disclosure is required for the purposes of preventing frauds or in public interest, without requiring further specific permission from me/us and I/we hereby provide unconditional consent for the same.
